author: Massimo N
title: Great for weekend getaway
text: This is the second time my wife and I have stayed at the Ritz-Carlton in Battery Park. The location of the hotel at the tip of Manhattan is second to none. The Staff is professional, reliable and welcoming. Our room had a beautiful view of the river and the Statue of Liberty. I know that we will be back for another getaway weekend, hopefully in late Spring.
